description.value: Code values representing a type of error from a failed operation to perform online verification of insurance data.

purpose.value: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0971 (Online Verification Result Error Code)

copyright.value: This material derives from the HL7 Terminology (THO). THO is copyright Â©1989+ Health Level Seven International and is made available under the CC0 designation. For more licensing information see: https://terminology.hl7.org/license.html

description.value: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

definition.value:
English: update of insurance date on card technically not possible
German: Aktualisierung VSD auf eGK technisch nicht möglich

English: authentication certificate is invalid
German: Authentifizierungszertifikat eGK ungültig

English: online verification of authentication certificate is technically not possible
German: Onlineprüfung des Authentifizierungszerti-fikats technisch nicht möglich

display.value: Update technically not possible due to offline time exceeded

definition.value:
English: update of insurance date is technically not possible due to maximum offline time exceeded
German: Aktualisierung VSD auf eGK technisch nicht möglich weil maximaler Offline-Zeitraum überschritten
